text: S&P 500 falls 1%, under pressure by tech; Bank of America, Wells Fargo slip after earnings: Live updates - CNBC
fullText: Traders digested a fresh batch of earnings and monitored geopolitical developments.

text: Patches of low vaccination in the US are becoming bigger, riskier holes - CNN
fullText: Opting out of childhood vaccines is becoming more common across most of the United States, leaving larger shares of the population vulnerable to preventable diseases like measles, which is continuing its record-breaking spread across the country.

text: Grammy-nominated musician John Forté found dead at 50 in Massachusetts home - NBC News
fullText: NEW YORK — John Forté, the Grammy-nominated musician known for his work with the Fugees and the Refugee Camp All-Stars among others, has died at age 50.

text: Trump envoy announces launch of ‘phase two’ of plan to end Gaza war - Al Jazeera
fullText: Steve Witkoff says Donald Trump’s Gaza plan is ‘moving from ceasefire to demilitarization, technocratic governance’.

text: Sources: Hornets to retire Dell Curry's jersey - ESPN
fullText: Charlotte Hornets great Dell Curry, father of guards Stephen and Seth Curry, is having his jersey retired in March.

text: Scientists sequence a woolly rhino genome from a 14,400-year-old wolf’s stomach - Ars Technica
fullText: Fortunately for paleogeneticists, wolf puppies don't chew their food thoroughly.

text: An Update to Our Shared Commitment to Safer Gaming - Xbox Wire
fullText: Nintendo, Sony Interactive Entertainment, and Microsoft continue to collaborate to improve player safety across our platforms - today, we're providing an update on our shared online safety principles.

text: FBI executes search warrant at Washington Post reporter’s home - The Washington Post
fullText: The search came as part of an investigation into a government contractor accused of illegally retaining classified government materials.

text: ICE agent who shot Renee Good suffered internal bleeding, officials say - CBS News
fullText: Jonathan Ross, who shot Renee Good in Minneapolis last week, suffered internal bleeding after the incident, two officials said, though it's not clear how extensive the bleeding was.

text: The weapons the US could employ in any new strike on Iran - CNN
fullText: A US military strike to support Iran’s protesters would need to be very different from Trump’s operation to target the country’s nuclear facilities.

text: Family of couple allegedly killed by ex speaks out: 'She just had to get away from him' - ABC News

fullText: In February, four new games join Apple Arcade, including Sid Meier’s Civilization VII Arcade Edition.

text: Greetings from Acre, Israel, where an old fortress recalls the time of the Crusades - NPR

text: The Opener: Tucker, Cardinals, Yankees, Marlins - MLB Trade Rumors

text: US reducing personnel at Qatar air base, official tells CBS - BBC
fullText: Officials say it is a "precautionary measure" and comes as Donald Trump weighs up whether to take action against Iran.

text: ISS astronaut medical evacuation latest news: Crew-11 astronauts to undock from station - Space
fullText: Wednesday, Jan. 14, 2026: Updates on NASA's astronaut medical evacuation from the International Space Station.

text: Red Bull F1 Just Revealed a Never-Before-Seen Variant of the Ford Mustang on YouTube - Road & Track
fullText: A YouTube video posted by Red Bull showcasing the racing team's drivers and 100 years of Ford Racing vehicles had Max Verstappen driving a new car called the 2026 Ford Mustang Dark Horse SC.

text: T. rex grew up slowly: New study reveals 'king of dinosaurs' kept growing until age 40 - Phys.org
fullText: For decades, scientists have been counting annual growth rings—similar to tree rings—inside fossilized leg bones of Tyrannosaurus rex to estimate how old the giant carnivores were when they died and how quickly they grew to adulthood. The best estimates from …
